name: Speedsters - "Wear Your Passion"
description:
Return to Virtual ShowcaseThe name of the project is “SPEEDSTERS”. The project is about creating an automotive-themed apparel brand from start to finish. The brand will cater to car enthusiasts or as we may call them “PETROL-HEADS”. The brand will produce all types of apparel and accessories.

In this project, I will be making a complete brand identity design, and our goal is to help the car lovers living in the UAE to express their love for cars through fashion.

Team Member:

  • Parichay Nehru

Return to Virtual Showcase
